options.content: ram pressure is maximum at the start of the take-off run
ram pressure is unaffected by airspeed
thrust is unaffected by the aircraftâ€™s forward speed
thrust is maximum and ram pressure at minimum at the start of the take-off run

questions.question: In a high bypass engine whose fan max rpm is 20 000 rpm, when turning at 5000 rpm will develop approx.

options.content: 25% take-off thrust
50% take-off thrust
5% take-off thrust
15% take-off thrust

questions.question:
With an increase in altitude which of the following statements are correct for a jet aircraft with constant engine speed for a fixed throttle setting?

1. Temperature and pressure reduce with a resulting drop in thrust

2. Fuel consumption will increase

3. Fuel consumption will decrease

4. Specific fuel consumption will increase

5. Specific fuel consumption will decrease

6. Specific fuel consumption stays relatively the same

7. Temperature and pressure will reduce, resulting in an increase in thrust

As temperature _____ air density_____ and the mass of air for given engine speed _____ therefore thrust _____ To maintain the compressor speed however .............. fuel must be added or the compressor will _____

options.content: decreases , decreases , increases , increases , less , slow down
increases , decreases , decreases , increases , more , slow down
decreases , increases , increases , increases , more , slow down
increases , decreases , increases , decreases , less , speed up

questions.question: From a standing start with an increase in forward speed jet thrust will:

options.content: increase
stay the same
decrease
decrease then recover but will never achieve its initial setting

questions.question: On a turboprop aircraft with a 14 stage axial flow compressor while climbing it will experience:

options.content: increase shaft horsepower increase jet thrust increase fuel consumption
decrease shaft horsepower decrease jet thrust decrease fuel consumption
decrease shaft horsepower increase jet thrust decrease fuel consumption
decrease shaft horsepower decrease jet thrust increase fuel consumption

questions.question: On a turboprop aircraft with a 14 stage axial flow compressor while increasing forward speed, it will experience:

options.content: increase shaft horsepower increase jet thrust increase fuel consumption
decrease shaft horsepower decrease jet thrust decrease fuel consumption
decrease shaft horsepower increase jet thrust decrease fuel consumption
decrease shaft horsepower decrease jet thrust increase fuel consumption

questions.question: On a turboprop aircraft with a 14 stage axial flow compressor while increasing forward speed, it will experience:

options.content: increase shaft horsepower increase jet thrust
decrease shaft horsepower decrease jet thrust
decrease shaft horsepower increase jet thrust
increase shaft horsepower decrease jet thrust

questions.question: On a part throttled engine, take-off thrust would be achieved:

options.content: later than normal due to pressure in the compressor being low
later than normal due to the EPR being low
at less than full throttle position
later than normal due to the EPR being high
